item.title: PlotChain: Deterministic Checkpointed Evaluation of Multimodal LLMs on Engineering Plot Reading
item.description: arXiv:2602.13232v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present PlotChain, a deterministic, generator-based benchmark for evaluating multimodal large language models (MLLMs) on engineering plot reading-recovering quantitative values from classic plots (e.g., Bode/FFT, step response, stress-strain, pump ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> multimodal, model, large language model, arxiv, release | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
